channel.title: Mendorphins, you're stupid. Powerbot isn't infected, READ THIS
channel.description:
Mendorphins is a fucking dumb ass.
By: Wui Su (PowerBot Administrator/VIP) Powerbot is not infected, and due to the recent update with the free trade etc Powerbot will be taking on a massive amount of new members. We would never amount to taking gold from our users. Our primary intent is to keep our users safe, happy and having fun within our community. We have moderators and administrators to keep you safe, but some things may be missed. Firstly, I'd like to point out that Arbiter recently resigned, and after careful consideration and research it would seem that his bot, ArbiBots has been infecting people and taking accounts. If you ever used ArbiBots, please change your password immediately, delete it and file a dispute against the payment on paypal. However, we are not putting the blame fully on them, many java drive-bys, edited versions of RSBot and other things have been posted on the forum. These viruses will have stayed dormant until free trade is out, and then taken the chance to get everything. Because of these two things together, it would appear than ALOT of users have lost their accounts or items. We are not sure how many but we do know ArbiBots has done a fair amount of this. Summary: ArbiBots has been infecting people. File a dispute on Paypal IMMEDIATELY! Also, as there have been many different versions of RSBot recently, & the real RSBot is the only one that is known to be safe we recommend everyone changed their passwords immediately and doesn't use anything but the RSBot client. We would also like to make sure everyone considers virus scanning their computers. Regards, Powerbot. We wish you the best, and the safest botting experience! For any other updates, please use our twitter. We also encourage you to use our irc channel's #rsbot and #rscode which can befound at irc.rizon.net

item.title: Mendorphins, you're stupid. Powerbot isn't infected, READ THIS
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

Mendorphins is a fucking dumb ass.

By: Wui Su (PowerBot Administrator/VIP) Powerbot is not infected, and due to the recent update with the free trade etc Powerbot will be taking on a massive amount of new members. We would never amount to taking gold from our users. Our primary intent is to keep our users safe, happy and having fun within our community. We have moderators and administrators to keep you safe, but some things may be missed.

Firstly, I’d like to point out that Arbiter recently resigned, and after careful consideration and research it would seem that his bot, ArbiBots has been infecting people and taking accounts.

If you ever used ArbiBots, please change your password immediately, delete it and file a dispute against the payment on paypal.

However, we are not putting the blame fully on them, many java drive-bys, edited versions of RSBot and other things have been posted on the forum. These viruses will have stayed dormant until free trade is out, and then taken the chance to get everything.

Because of these two things together, it would appear than ALOT of users have lost their accounts or items. We are not sure how many but we do know ArbiBots has done a fair amount of this.

Summary:
ArbiBots has been infecting people. File a dispute on Paypal IMMEDIATELY!

Also, as there have been many different versions of RSBot recently, & the real RSBot is the only one that is known to be safe we recommend everyone changed their passwords immediately and doesn’t use anything but the RSBot client. We would also like to make sure everyone considers virus scanning their computers.

Regards,
Powerbot.

We wish you the best, and the safest botting experience!

For any other updates, please use our twitter.

We also encourage you to use our irc channel’s #rsbot and #rscode which can befound at irc.rizon.net
